channel.title: Dont play primal age!
channel.description:
Donors can apparently see your ip... one threatened to ddos or as i later looked into it "syn" attack me. Right when they said that i dced from the server and my internet went out. Good thing i had my router page open ready to change ip ( i was messing around with cheat cleint) so i did dhcp release and renew so the attacker could no longer ddos me.
Don't play that server though.
Got attacked 2 times after changing my ip twice after relogging back in.
Proof:(my router has incorrect time don't worry about it) EDIT: more proof. first attack: [img]http://i46.tinypic.com/2im0prk.jpg[/img] Second after I changed ip and logged back in: [img]http://i47.tinypic.com/2ebvi9d.jpg[/img]

item.title: Dont play primal age!
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:7, topic:469281”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=586398.msg4163847#msg4163847 date=1353445742]
If you have any proof that he’s really getting it from the server and not from something else, then we can say the server is being malicious and delete its advertisement. So… do you have any proof?
[/quote]not sure the server is malicious more so, the specific player/donor is. While I would NEVER support a server that had such a feature I wouldn’t delete the server because of that either[/quote]
Maybe put some kind of warning that you may be putting your privacy at risk by entering this server should be required.

Read full topic

Most servers have a get ip command but itd mostly for admins or like on soulsplits mods+

item.title: Dont play primal age!
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

Thanks for warning everyone.

However, I don’t think that anyone here can do much about their donor benefits. If that includes a command that gets someones IP address then that’s their fault and not ours.

Read full topic
